transcript: I didn't know sales as a term existed the first time somebody walked in he's like oh go sign this girl up no training no script no nothing I came from a management consulting background I had no idea what I was doing I was like Jim's 129 a month when I signed up and she was like yeah I don't have my credit card with me I just have to go get it I was like okay then I walked out two minutes later and I was like yeah she's gonna sign up he was like you closed her in two minutes and I was like yeah I guess he's like you got the card and I was like no but she's she'll be back she's just gonna go get a credit card he's like ah dude if you don't get the card you didn't call us
